entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain. High zero except plus 4 across upper Richelieu.
entry.summary: Freezing rain except rain across upper Richelieu. Risk of a thunderstorm. Rainfall amount 15 mm across upper Richelieu. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero except plus 4 across upper Richelieu. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Rain across upper Richelieu early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 11.
